contentfulProduct.seoTitle: Luxe Italian Piped Border Duvet Cover Set
contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Our line of Italian bedding is masterfully crafted of the finest long-staple cotton by renowned Italian artisans in the outskirts of Florence.  Our piped border duvet set combines a traditional and refined design with impeccably smooth and crisp percale.
contentfulProduct.title: Luxe Italian Piped Border Duvet Cover Set

content.value: Our line of Italian bedding is masterfully crafted of the finest long-staple cotton by renowned Italian artisans in the outskirts of Florence. Our piped border duvet set combines a traditional and refined design with impeccably smooth and crisp percale. Set includes duvet cover and two shams.
Percale weave made of the finest 100% long-staple cotton
Set includes duvet cover and two shams
Full/Queen set includes standard size shams, King/Cal King set includes king size shams
Shams feature envelope closure
Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
Masterfully crafted in Italy
Wash with care

productDetails.productDetails:
• Percale weave made of the finest 100% long-staple cotton
  • Set includes duvet cover and two shams
  • Full/Queen set includes standard size shams, King/Cal King set includes king size shams
  • Shams feature envelope closure
  • Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
  • Masterfully crafted in Italy
